Reviews.Content: stayed 5 day trip berlin family absolute choice price reasonable amount standards service hotel staff nice polite 45 star hotels spacious tidy family suite lot space including bathroom beds comfortable clean service people hotel city centre completely wrong yes cant walk city centre 46 minute walking distance biggest stations berlin 5 stations brandenburg gate 6 potzdamer platz 8 minute underground alexanderplatz main berlin easily city centre 20min change hotel nice lot takeaways huge shopping centre grocery stores park walk front hotel complain prices breakfast isnt included costs 17 euros person top sauna mini gym inside building overall hotel hotel reasonable price reasonable location service id strongly recommend budget pleasant stay berlin
